Overview¶

This tutorial provides an overview of how you can use Lux in your data exploration workflow. You can follow along the tutorial using this Jupyter notebook.

Lux Overview¶

Lux is designed to be tightly integrated with Pandas, so that Lux can be used as-is, without modifying your existing Pandas code.

import pandas as pd
import lux

We can load the dataset via any of the standard Pandas commands. For example,

df = pd.read_csv("lux/data/college.csv")
